name: Nami
title: the Tidecaller
lore: A headstrong young vastaya of the seas, Nami was the first of the Marai tribe to leave the waves and venture onto dry land, when their ancient accord with the Targonians was broken. With no other option, she took it upon herself to complete the sacred ritual that would ensure the safety of her people. Amidst the chaos of this new age, Nami faces an uncertain future with grit and determination, using her Tidecaller staff to summon the strength of the oceans themselves.
blurb: A headstrong young vastaya of the seas, Nami was the first of the Marai tribe to leave the waves and venture onto dry land, when their ancient accord with the Targonians was broken. With no other option, she took it upon herself to complete the sacred...
allytips: Aqua Prison has a long cooldown, make sure to use it at the right moment.
Using Ebb and Flow during an engagement with enemy champions will help sway the battle in your favor.
Nami's ultimate can come in very handy for initiating on enemies who are far away.
enemytips: Aqua Prison is a very powerful ability with a long cooldown, take advantage of the situation if Nami misses this ability.
Tidal Wave has a very long range but travels slowly, be aware of when it is coming your way as you can move out of its path.
Try to avoid fighting an opponent affected by Tidecaller's Blessing, it lasts a short duration so waiting it out can help you greatly.

riot_spell_q.name: Aqua Prison
riot_spell_q.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
riot_spell_q.tooltip: Sends a bubble to target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

riot_spell_w.name: Ebb and Flow
riot_spell_w.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions.

On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.

On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion.

Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ({{ f1 }}%) each bounce.

riot_spell_e.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
riot_spell_e.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
riot_spell_e.tooltip: Empowers an allied champion's next {{ e4 }} basic attacks, causing them to slow the target by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} second and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage. Lasts for {{ e5 }} seconds.

riot_spell_r.name: Tidal Wave
riot_spell_r.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position. The wave knocks up enemies and slows them by {{ e4 }}%, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of {{ e3 }} seconds and a maximum of {{ e5 }} seconds.

Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

riot_spell_i.name: Surging Tides
riot_spell_i.description: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Surging Tides
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} All allied [[champion]]s touched by any of '''Nami's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] gain {{sti|ms|{{as|60|ms}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds,{{ft|doubled|{{as|120|ms}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}} when touched by {{ai|Tidal Wave|Nami}}.
wikia_skill_i1.notes: * ''Surging Tides'' will apply when an ally champion is targeted by {{ai|Ebb and Flow|Nami}} / {{ai|Tidecaller's Blessing|Nami}} or when within {{ai|Aqua Prison|Nami}} / {{ais|Tidal Wave|Nami}} impact area.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Aqua Prison
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nami''' sends a bubble towards the targeted area, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies hit, {{tip|sight|revealing}} them, and {{tip|suspension|suspending}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* ''Aqua Prison'' counts as a knockup for enabling {{ai|Last Breath|Yasuo}}.<ref>[http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1s0gkx/were_the_yasuo_team_ama/cdsp1op Yasuo Reddit AMA]</ref>
* Cast time makes ''Aqua Prison'' take ~{{fd|0.875}} seconds from casting to landing regardless of distance.
** Since the area of effect has a ~162 units radius, an enemy unit with {{fd|185.14}} or less movement speed (325 affected by a {{fd|53.8}}% slow, due to the low-end movement speed soft cap) would find it impossible to escape.
*** As a result it might be necessary to have another source of crowd control in order for ''Aqua Prison'' to land. A fully-ranked {{ai|Tidecaller's Blessing|Nami}} powered by {{as|376 AP}} would be able to slow for the amount above, alhough it is unlikely an enemy has not purchased movement speed by that time.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Ebb and Flow
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nami''' unleashes a stream of water onto the target champion or herself, which then bounces to nearby unaffected champions up to twice, alternating between enemies, allies and herself.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: ''Ebb and Flow'' {{tip|Heal|heals}} allies and deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies, with each bounce being 85% {{as|(+ {{fd|7.5%}} per 100 AP)}} as effective as the previous one.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block only one bounce. ''Ebb and Flow'' will continue to bounce and the target who blocked the ability may be targeted again by a later bounce.
* Additional [[ability power]] will modify the damage/healing of ''Ebb and Flow'' by a percentage, based on the number of bounces.
** At Rank 5 with {{as|0 AP}} (-15% per bounce) the first heal/damage will be 185/230, the second 157/196, and the third 130/161.
*** At Rank 5 with {{as|200 AP}} (no change per bounce) the heal/damage will be will remain at 245/330 throughout.
**** At Rank 5 with {{as|600 AP}} (+30% per bounce) the first heal/damage will be 365/530, the second 475/689, and the third 584/848.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nami''' blesses the target allied champion or herself for 6 seconds, causing her target's next three [[basic attack]]s to each deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{tip|slow}} their target for 1 second.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Tidecaller's Blessing'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Nami's'' previous orders.
* The enhanced attacks will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} do not interact with ''Tidecaller's Blessing's'' bonus damage.
* ''Tidecaller's Blessing'' has no effect against structures.
* ''Tidecaller's Blessing'' will not proc {{ii|Muramana}} more than once per auto attack.
* Both effects of ''Tidecaller's Blessing'' will be wasted if the attacks are {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, or if they {{tip|blind|miss}}.
* ''Tidecaller's Blessing's'' amount of on-hit damage dealt is based on ''Nami's'' own [[ability power]] on-cast.
** It's also based on the buffed ally's [[magic penetration]] rather than ''Nami's''.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Tidal Wave
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nami''' summons a tidal wave that surges forth, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all units it hits, {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{tt|{{fd|0.5}}|Estimated}} seconds and then {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{pp|type=distance traveled|11|2|2.2|2.4|2.6|2.8|3|3.2|3.4|3.6|3.8|4|0|275|550|825|1100|1375|1650|1925|2200|2475|2750|formula=2 (+ <nowiki>{{fd|0.2}}</nowiki> per 275 units traveled). ''The duration increased is capped at 2750 units.''}} seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* There is a brief channel time during which '''Nami''' performs the animation.
** It can only be interrupted by death in which case the ability will not trigger and will not go on cooldown.
* {{ai|Surging Tides|Nami}} will immediately trigger on Nami on cast.
* The wave travels for ~{{fd|3.2}} seconds at ~859 speed and the projectile is ~562 units wide.
** It is undodgeable by foot at 325 movement speed and 742 range.
* The wave places you slightly closer to her cast position.
